rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的生物工程策略显示出治疗溃疡性结肠炎的潜力通过利用癌细胞逃避免疫攻击的机制，德克萨斯大学西南医学中心的研究人员在动物模型中开发了一种新策略，该策略具有治疗溃疡性结肠炎的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-bioengineered-strategy-shows-potial-for-treating-ulcerative-colitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/New-bioengineered-strategy-shows-potential-for-treating-ulcerative-colitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5347be8e-bd5e-4952-b3b3-09fe0394f74c Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:51:00 -0500 New bioengineered strategy shows potential for treating ulcerative colitis
强迫症患者因自然和非自然原因死亡的风险可能更高《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项来自瑞典的研究发现，患有强迫症 (OCD) 的人因自然和非自然原因死亡的风险可能比未患强迫症的人更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/OCD-病人-may-have-higher-risk-of-death-from-both-natural-and-unnatural-causes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/OCD-病人-may-have-higher-risk-of-death-from-both-natural-and-unnatural-causes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbf5bce3-0a48-4db2-ab06-757aed9a0c3e Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:46:19 -0500 OCD patients may have higher risk of death from both natural and unnatural causes
基因分型技术加速新冠病毒变异识别根据东安格利亚大学和英国卫生安全局的研究，基因分型技术比以往任何时候都更快、更便宜地检测新冠病毒变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Genotyping-technology-speeds-up-Covid-variant-identification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Genotyping-technology-speeds-up-Covid-variant-identification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08a2a519-6e5d-4526-aa19-ffb740a9635c Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:41:00 -0500 Genotyping technology speeds up Covid variant identification
谁感染长期新冠病毒的风险更大？新研究揭示了弱势群体的人口统计数据一项对来自 BRFSS 和 NHIS 的 134,444 名参与者进行分析的研究显示，分别有 21.5% 和 17.1% 的人患有长期新冠肺炎，其中中年、女性、西班牙裔、受教育程度较低的人和某些地区的居民的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Whos-at-greater-risk-for-long-COVID-New-study-sheds-light-on-vulnerable-demgraphics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Whos-at-greater-risk-for-long-COVID-New-study-sheds-light-on-vulnerable-demgraphics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cd8290b-3bb4-48ad-983d-5aefcb9b57aa Wed, 17 Jan 2024 21:55:00 -0500 Who's at greater risk for long-COVID? New study sheds light on vulnerable demographics
世卫组织研究显示，COVID-19 疫苗在欧洲拯救了超过 140 万人的生命一项研究分析了 2020 年 12 月至 2023 年 3 月欧洲的 COVID-19 死亡率和疫苗接种数据，发现疫苗接种工作使死亡人数减少了 57%，挽救了约 140 万人的生命，其中在老年人和 Omicron 变种期间观察到的影响最为显着涌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/COVID-19-vaccines-saved-over-14-million-lives-across-Europe-WHO-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/COVID-19-vaccines-saved-over-14-million-lives-across-Europe-WHO-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09970977-967f-4b77-ae44-769dcf7e04b5 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 21:27:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccines saved over 1.4 million lives across Europe, WHO study reveals
是什么让人们看牙医时感到恶心？研究发现，自我报告的呕吐恐惧症、过度作呕和牙科焦虑之间存在显着相关性，超过 50% 的参与者回忆起不愉快的呕吐或作呕经历，并且牙科诊所的气味对这些情况有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/What-makes-people-gag-at-dentists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/What-makes-people-gag-at-dentists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8718bcbc-5de9-41c6-bbd0-8a9a9a98c7b6 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 20:24:00 -0500 What makes people gag at dentists?
研究表明肠道蠕虫感染会减弱 T 细胞对 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗的反应研究调查了蠕虫感染对 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗功效的影响，结果表明，虽然抗体反应基本上不受影响，但 T 细胞反应显着受损，特别是针对 Omicron 变体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-reveals-intestinal-helminth-infection-diminishes-T-cell-response-to-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-reveals-intestinal-helminth-infection-diminishes-T-cell-response-to-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=118a188a-e828-4838-b7c5-c0ee902cc247 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 19:49:00 -0500 Study reveals intestinal helminth infection diminishes T cell response to COVID-19 mRNA vaccine
气候变化使空气质量警报增加四倍，对美国脆弱社区的适应提出了挑战研究调查了气候变化对美国空气质量警报的影响，结果显示到 2100 年，空气质量警报可能增加四倍，对适应策略（尤其是脆弱社区）的健康和公平产生重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Climate-change-to-quadruple-air-quality-alerts-challenging-adaptation-in-vulnerable-US-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Climate-change-to-quadruple-air-quality-alerts-challenging-adaptation-in-vulnerable-US-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02eab73d-9c93-48ce-9482-45f5251139da Wed, 17 Jan 2024 19:24:00 -0500 Climate change to quadruple air quality alerts, challenging adaptation in vulnerable U.S. communities
COVID-19 疫苗在预防儿童长期感染新冠肺炎方面取得了一定成功研究表明，COVID-19 疫苗可适度降低儿童长期感染新冠病毒的风险，与年龄较小的儿童相比，在青少年中观察到的效果更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/COVID-19-vaccines-show-moderate-success-in-preventing-long-COVID-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/COVID-19-vaccines-show-moderate-success-in-preventing-long-COVID-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b69824b-916c-443c-a98c-17d85a4d1cb0 Wed, 17 Jan 2024 19:05:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccines show moderate success in preventing long COVID in kids
研究表明肠道噬菌体可能与哮喘的发生有关研究人员研究了生命早期肠道病毒组（特别是温带噬菌体类群）与儿童期哮喘发展之间的关系，同时考虑了与宿主遗传学和细菌组的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-suggests-gut-phages-may-be-involved-in-the-development-of-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240117/Study-suggests-gut-phages-may-be-involved-in-the-development-of-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28599448-e1ea-4804-999e-675ed21ffbaf Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:37:00 -0500 Study suggests gut phages may be involved in the development of asthma
